title: Play school. Out and about
creator_credit: Maija Rove, Henrietta Clark and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: Play School in these two programs goes to the beach and spends a day in the Botanic Gardens. Both programs feature songs and stories about the beach and the botanic gardens. Presenters include Colin Buchanan, John Hamblin, Don Spencer and Monica Trapaga.
